Name: Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 -
About the game: LynxHelixEngine's first shoot'em up game. 'Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 -' The aim is to create a game that even inexperienced players can enjoy with simple controls and auto-bomb equivalent Drive. Depending on the equipment you choose, Galatea's outfit and performance will be divided. Use your Shot and Drive to establish your own play style. Please look forward to a science fiction story with fascinating characters. Story Three years ago, a meteorite fell in the desert region of this planet. We could not believe our eyes when we saw that thing recovered by the survey team. It was a fighter built by means completely different from the thechnology we have. The fighter was heavily damaged and its cockpit was exposed, but we were able to find the equivalent of a black box in an almost intact state. This mysterious object will no doubt evolve human civilization. We must analyze this black box at all cost. However, due to unknown protocols and advanced protections, the analysis did not go as smoothly as it should have. After many meetings, it was decided to use the latest android from that company. 'Humanoid Penetration System Galatea' Connect her to the black box and let her dive into the sea of data. The plan is to have her break through unknown protections to access the main system and obtain information. We can monitor her situation, but many were opposed to entrusting the future of science to a stand-alone android. It’s natural that they would. There is very little information about her given to us. For us, she is also a black box. *EXCERPT FROM A RESEARCHER’S DIARY Features Fascinating characters. Simple controls. 3 difficulty levels for beginners and advanced users. 5 Stages + Extra The auto-bomb function is easy for beginners. XInput controller support. Program, scenario, illustrations, music, and sound effects are all produced by the individual. How to play Cursor Keys: Move the Character Z: Shot X: Drive R(Hold): Restart Esc: Pause *For game controllers, the assignment can be changed in the options.
